column1: #Text=A paging system comprising : terminal receiving means ( 10 ) for receiving a message comprising a plurality of encoded ideographical characters ; determining means ( 86 ) coupled to the terminal receiving means ( 10 ) for determining whether each of the encoded ideographical characters corresponds to one character of a universal character set , the determining means further determines whether each encoded ideographical character not found within the universal character set corresponds to a replaceable ideographical character or is a non-replaceable ideographical character according to the universal character set ; replacement means ( 94 ) for replacing each replaceable character as determined by the determining means with a replacement character ; code converting means ( 88 ) for converting the encoded ideographical characters found within the universal character set and the replacement characters to a first code ; and transmitting means ( 36 ) for transmitting said first code and the non-replaceable ideographical characters to at least one selective call receiver ( 34 ) at a remote location ; the selective call receiver ( 34 ) , comprising : receiving means ( 36 ) for receiving said first code and said non-replaceable characters ; decoding means ( 52 ) , coupled to said receiving means ( 36 ) , for decoding said first code to produce the ideographical characters encoded therein , said decoding means ( 52 ) comprising a replacing means ( 144 ) for replacing the decoded non-replaceable ideographical character with a predetermined character symbol ; and display means ( 58 ) for displaying the decoded ideographical characters and the pre-determined character symbol .

#Text=A selective call receiver for use within an ideographical character signalling system for receiving data signals comprising a plurality of coded ideographical character messages wherein ideographical characters corresponding to one character of a universal set and replaceable ideographical characters of the ideographical character messages are code converted to a first code according to a universal character set , and non-replaceable ideographical characters of the ideographical character messages according to said universal character set are not code converted , said receiver comprising : a decoder for decoding each one of the plurality of coded ideographical characters within said plurality of coded ideographical character messages ; a character generator for generating ideographical characters from the decoded first code for display ; a micro-processor controller for determining the plurality of decoded ideographical characters within said plurality of coded ideographical character messages , said micro-processor controller , in response to a decoded first code , selects the corresponding ideographical character from the character generator and said micro-processor controller , in response to decoding a non-replaceable ideographical character , selects a predetermined character symbol ; and display means for displaying the decoded ideographical characters and said predetermined character symbols .
